entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
